purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe software.
This second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
In addition, modifications have been made to the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Document definition, ISO/TS 10303-1123;
items within the scope of application module Information product, ISO/TS 10303-1761.

ae.refpath: product_definition {product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name='software'}

aa.refpath: product_definition product_definition.formation -> product_definition_formation {product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name='software'}

ae.refpath: product_definition_formation {product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name='software'}

aa.refpath: product_definition_formation product_definition_formation.of_product -> product {product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name = 'software'}
